name: Space FriendSHIP
description:
Space FriendSHIP is a new rival game taking place in the wide-open universe. You are fighting against aliens who are trying to kill you at every single moment. You have only one choice and it is to face them to save your universe. You can either play with a friend of yours or fight with an advanced AI which will help you from the very beginning. You can purchase different abilities and increase your chances of winning but always watch your back. Good luck, captain!

TIP: Use only the "Escape"-button for smooth escape from the game

1st place at KITE 2020 category OPEN 12+
